title: Secretos de Estado
overview: Alberto Guzm√°n, president of the government, and his wife Ana Chantalle form the perfect presidential couple. However, their impeccable public image begins to crack when, as a result of an assassination attempt, very compromising data about the president's private life and his relationship with his press officer begin to come to light. After certain secrets are revealed, a media and political hurricane, impossible to stop, will be unleashed, involving the top leaders of the party and the government.
